casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Thomas HESTER. No. 165P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of April 2008 by Defendant for a Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
